long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add accessibility menu to every website!

Features:
* increase text size
* decrease text size
* increase text spacing
* decrease text spacing
* invert colors
* gray hues
* underline links
* hotkeys
* big cursor
* reading guide
* text to speech
* speech to text

For developers who what's to add this to their site:
npm:
https://www.npmjs.com/package/accessibility
github:
https://github.com/ranbuch/accessibility
